page.title: 09Transport
page.content:
Saughall is linked to Chester by Corporation bus service number 15 which runs half-hourly all day and hourly in the evenings.The village is also served by infrequent Crosville services from North Wales.It is linked to Upton High School by Meredith ,Hollis and Lofty vehicles.
Other road users are largely commuter traffic and so local roads are busy,mornings and evenings.
Farm vehicles also use the roads in this rural localality and large lorries may be observed delivering to the village shops.
